text: The 2016 World Match Racing Tour was a series of match racing sailing regattas staged during 2016 season. Phil Robertson won the tour by winning the last event in Marstrand, Sweden.http://wmrt.com/robertson-is-crowned-the-million- dollar-world-champion/ ==Regattas== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Dates !
